channel.title: Mockup on PR
channel.description: Recent content in Mockup on PR

item.title: Idea Vault: Prj - Dug Me
item.description: Task management app with little twist. Yep, Dug instead of clippy while nagging. Idea is to log all our project ideas similar to logging notes in nvALT.

item.title: Idea Vault: Tree view
item.description: A Bookmarklet or a Browser extension to select the root element of a DOM (UL/OL) to view the Inverted tree structure of its child nodes.

item.title: Idea Vault: iBooks 3.0

item.title: Idea Vault: When is that?
item.description: I guess like me there will be many people often confuse appointments/client calls due to timezone differences. I am not talking about people who send/receive schedules from Outlook (or similar apps).
